meanings.definition: (adjective) of a stone or mineral) having value but not in the same category as precious stones
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful semiprecious necklace to the party.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry store displayed a variety of semiprecious gemstones.
meanings.sent3: The semiprecious ring told jokes to the other jewelry in the box.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a semiprecious gem, rare and valuable.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with semiprecious colors, mesmerizing all who saw.

meanings.sent1: She collected semiprecious from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a special exhibit featuring various semiprecious.
meanings.sent3: The semiprecious whispered secrets to the other stones in the collection.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like semiprecious stones in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The riverbed was filled with semiprecious treasures waiting to be discovered.
